items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: An ingot full of potential. Can be used to craft iron armor, weapons, and tools.

items.name: Gold Ingot
items.description: An ingot full of potential. Can be used to craft gold armor, weapons, and tools.

items.name: Diamond
items.description: A shiny gem. Can be used to craft powerful diamond armor, weapons, and tools.

items.name: Iron Pickaxe
items.description: A basic but durable pickaxe. Breaks rocks!

items.name: Gold Pickaxe
items.description: A fast but flimsy pickaxe. Breaks rocks!

items.name: Diamond Pickaxe
items.description: A very fast and durable pickaxe. Breaks rocks!

items.name: Iron Shovel
items.description: A basic but durable shovel. Breaks dirt/gravel/sand!

items.name: Gold Shovel
items.description: A fast but flimsy shovel. Breaks dirt/gravel/sand!

items.name: Diamond Shovel
items.description: A very fast and durable shovel. Breaks dirt/gravel/sand!

items.name: Iron Axe
items.description: A basic but durable axe. Chops wood!

items.name: Gold Axe
items.description: A fast but flimsy axe. Chops wood!

items.name: Diamond Axe
items.description: A very fast and durable axe. Chops wood!

items.name: Bread
items.description: A good basic food.

items.name: Steak
items.description: A very filling food.

items.name: Golden Apple
items.description: Filled with magic, this powerful apple grants you extra health!

type.name: food
type.effects: Absorption for 2 minutes and regeneration for 5 seconds!

items.name: Golden 'God' Apple
items.description: The ultimate food, this apple makes the player tough and filled with vitality!

type.name: food
type.effects: Absorption 4 for 2 minutes, Regeneration 2 for 20 seconds, and Fire Resistance and Damage Resistance for 5 minutes!

items.name: Stone Sword
items.description: The basic weapon for combat. Help your favorite player triump in battle!

items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: An upgraded sword for combat. Help your favorite player triump in battle!

items.name: Diamond Sword
items.description: The ultimate sword for combat. Help your favorite player triump in battle with style!

items.name: Bow
items.description: Minecraft's signature ranged weapon. Can take out foes at a distance!
